- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-911">фуехрерсчеин — НР</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-911">fuehrerschein- nr</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-912">Бельгийский национальный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-912">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-913">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации включен в тип конфиденциальной информации страны ЕС и доступен как отдельный объект типа конфиденциальной информации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-913">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-914">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-915">11 цифр, а также разделители.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-915">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-916">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-917">11 цифр, а также разделители:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-917">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-918">шесть цифр и две точки в формате ГГ.ММ.ДД для даты рождения;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-918">Six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-919">дефис;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-919">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-920">три последовательные цифры (нечетные для мужчин, четные для женщин);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-920">Three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-921">точка;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-921">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-922">две проверочные цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-922">Two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-923">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-923">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-924">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-924">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-925">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-925">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-926">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-926">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-927">функция Func_belgium_national_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-927">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-928">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_belgium_national_number;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-928">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-929">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-929">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-930">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-930">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_national_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-931">Keyword_belgium_national_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-931">Keyword_belgium_national_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-933">бнн #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-933">bnn#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-936">Идентификация National</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-936">identifiant national</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-937">идентифиантнатионал #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-937">identifiantnational#</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-988">Номер паспорта Бельгии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-988">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-989">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-989">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-990">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-990">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-991">Две буквы, за которыми следуют шесть цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-991">Two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-992">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-992">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-993">Две буквы, за которыми следуют шесть цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-993">Two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-994">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-995">Неприменимо</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-995">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-996">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-997">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-997">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-998">Регулярное выражение `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-998">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-999">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-999">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1000">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1000">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1001">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1001">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1002">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1002">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1003">Бельгийский номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1003">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1004">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1004">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1005">паспурт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1005">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1006">паспуртнуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1006">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1007">реисепасс Кеин</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1007">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1008">реисепасс</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1008">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1009">Бельгийский номер социального страхования или идентификатор эквивалентной идентификации</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1009">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1010">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в номере социального страхования ЕС или эквивалентного идентификатора.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1010">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1011">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1012">11 цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1012">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1013">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1014">11 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1014">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1015">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1016">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1016">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1017">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1018">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1018">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1019">Функция `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1019">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1020">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1020">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1021">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1021">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1022">Функция `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1022">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1042">Идентификационный номер налога на Бельгии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1042">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1043">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только для типа конфиденциальной информации ЕС по налогу Идентификаитон.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1043">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1044">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1045">11 цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1045">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1046">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1047">11 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1047">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1048">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1048">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1049">"0" или "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1049">A "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1050">Одна цифра</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1050">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1051">"0" или "1" или "2" или "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1051">A "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1052">шесть цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1052">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1053">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1053">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1054">Неприменимо</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1054">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1055">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1055">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1056">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1056">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1057">Регулярное выражение `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1057">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1058">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1058">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1117">Номер CPF для Бразилии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1117">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1118">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1119">11 цифр, которые включают проверочную цифру и могут быть форматированными или неформатированными.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1119">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1120">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1121">Форматируемые</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1121">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1122">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1122">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1123">точка;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1123">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1124">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1124">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1125">точка;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1125">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1126">Три цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1126">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1127">дефис;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1127">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1128">две проверочные цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1128">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1129">Неформатированные</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1129">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1130">11 цифр, где две последние цифры — проверочные.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1130">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1131">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1132">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1132">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1133">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1134">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1134">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1135">функция Func_brazil_cpf находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1135">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1136">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_brazil_cpf;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1136">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1137">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1137">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1138">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1138">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1139">функция Func_brazil_cpf находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1139">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1140">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1140">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1141">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1141">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1142">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1142">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1143">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1143">CPF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1146">Реализации</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1146">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1147">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1147">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1148">импосто</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1148">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1149">идентификаçãо</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1149">Identificação</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1152">Номер юридического лица в Бразилии (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1152">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1153">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1153">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1154">14 цифр, которые включают регистрационный номер, номер филиала и проверочные цифры, а также разделители.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1154">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1155">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1155">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1156">14 цифр, а также разделители:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1156">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1157">две цифры;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1157">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1158">точка;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1158">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1159">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1159">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1160">точка;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1160">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1161">три цифры (эти первые восемь цифр — регистрационный номер);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1161">Three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1162">косая черта;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1162">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1163">номер отделения из четырех цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1163">Four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1164">дефис;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1164">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1165">две проверочные цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1165">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1166">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1166">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1167">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1167">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1168">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1168">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1169">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1169">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1170">функция Func_brazil_cnpj находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1170">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1171">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_brazil_cnpj;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1171">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1172">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1172">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1173">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1173">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1174">функция Func_brazil_cnpj находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1174">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1175">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1175">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1197">Национальная идентификационная карточка Бразилии (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1197">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1198">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1199">Registro Geral (старый формат): девять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1199">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1200">Registro de identidade (RIC) (новый формат): 11 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1200">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1201">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1201">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1202">Registro Geral (старый формат):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1202">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1203">две цифры;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1203">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1204">точка;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1204">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1205">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1205">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1206">точка;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1206">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1207">три цифры;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1207">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1208">дефис;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1208">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1209">одна цифра — проверочная.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1209">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1210">Registro de identidade (RIC) (новый формат):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1210">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1211">10 цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1211">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1212">дефис;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1212">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1213">одна цифра — проверочная.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1213">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1214">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1215">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1216">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1217">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1217">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1218">функция Func_brazil_rg находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1218">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1219">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_brazil_rg;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1219">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1220">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1221">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1221">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1222">функция Func_brazil_rg находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1222">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1223">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1224">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1224">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1225">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1225">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1226">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1226">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1227">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1227">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1228">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1228">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1229">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1229">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1230">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1230">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1231">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1231">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1232">RG (ключевое слово с учетом регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1232">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1233">RIC (ключевое слово с учетом регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1233">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1234">Номер водительского удостоверения для Болгария</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1234">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1235">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера лицензии для драйвера ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1235">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1236">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1237">Девять цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1237">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1238">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1239">Девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1239">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1240">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1240">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1241">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1241">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1242">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1242">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1243">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1243">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1244">Регулярное выражение `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1244">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1245">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1245">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1257">номер лицензии на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1257">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1258">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1258">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1264">Национальный идентификационный номер для Болгария</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1264">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1265">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации ЕС по национальному идентификационному номеру.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1265">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1266">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1266">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1267">Десять цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1267">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1268">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1268">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1269">Десять цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1269">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1270">Шесть цифр, соответствующих дате рождения (ГГММДД)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1270">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1271">Две цифры, соответствующие порядку рождения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1271">Two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1272">Одна цифра, соответствующая Пол: четное число для пола и нечетная цифра для розетки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1272">One digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1273">Одна контрольная цифра</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1273">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1274">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1275">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1276">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1277">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1277">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1278">Функция `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1278">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1279">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1279">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1280">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1280">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1281">Функция `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1281">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1326">Номер паспорта для Болгария</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1326">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1327">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1327">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1328">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1329">Девять цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1329">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1330">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1330">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1331">Девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1331">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1332">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1333">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1333">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1334">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1335">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1336">Регулярное выражение `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1336">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1337">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1337">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1338">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1338">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1339">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1339">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1340">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1340">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1341">номер паспорта для болгарского языка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1341">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1342">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1342">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1343">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1343">номер на паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1344">Идентификационный номер для налогообложения (Болгария)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1344">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1345">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации по идентификационному номеру Европейского налога ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1345">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1346">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1347">Десять цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1347">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1348">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1348">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1349">10 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1349">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1350">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1350">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1351">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1351">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1352">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1352">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1353">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1353">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1354">Функция `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1354">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1355">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1355">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1356">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1356">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1357">Функция `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1357">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1358">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1358">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1359">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1359">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1360">бнн #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1360">bnn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1361">бнн</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1361">bnn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1362">букн #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1362">bucn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1363">букн</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1363">bucn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1364">единен граздански номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1364">edinen grazhdanski nomer</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1402">Номер банковского счета для Канады</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1402">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1403">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1404">Семь или двенадцать цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1404">Seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1405">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1406">Номер банковского счета для Канады — семь или двенадцать цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1406">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1407">Транзитный номер банковского счета в Канаде имеет указанный ниже формат.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1407">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1408">пять цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1408">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1409">дефис;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1409">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1410">Три цифры или</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1410">Three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1411">ноль "0";</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1411">A zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1412">восемь цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1412">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1413">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1414">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1414">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1415">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1416">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1416">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1417">регулярное выражение Regex_canada_bank_account_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1417">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1418">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1418">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1419">регулярное выражение Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1419">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1420">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1420">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1421">регулярное выражение Regex_canada_bank_account_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1421">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1422">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1422">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1446">Номер водительского удостоверения для Канады</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1446">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1447">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1448">Зависит от провинции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1448">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1449">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1450">Различные шаблоны, соответствующие провинциям Альберта, Британская Колумбия, Манитоба, Нью-Брансуик, Ньюфаундленд и Лабрадор, Новая Шотландия, Онтарио, Остров Принца Эдуарда, Квебек и Саскачеван.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1450">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1451">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1452">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1452">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1453">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1454">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1454">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1455">функция Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1455">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1456">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1456">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1457">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_canada_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1457">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1458">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1458">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_province_name_drivers_license_name"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1459">Keyword_ [province_name] _drivers_license_name</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1459">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1460">Аббревиатура провинции, например AB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1460">The province abbreviation, for example AB</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1461">Название провинции, например Альберта.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1461">The province name, for example Alberta</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1599">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1599">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1600">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1600">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1601">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1601">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1602">регулярное выражение Regex_canada_health_service_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1602">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1603">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_canada_health_service_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1603">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1615">Номер паспорта для Канады</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1615">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1616">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1617">Две прописные буквы, за которыми следуют шесть цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1617">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1618">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1619">Две прописные буквы, за которыми следуют шесть цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1619">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1620">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1621">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1622">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1623">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1624">регулярное выражение Regex_canada_passport_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1624">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1625">Найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_canada_passport_number или Keyword_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1625">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1655">Идентификационный номер персонального контроля работоспособности для Канады (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1655">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1656">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1656">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1657">девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1657">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1658">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1658">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1659">Девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1659">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1660">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1660">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1661">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1661">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1662">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1662">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1663">Политика защиты от потери данных — 75% уверенности в том, что этот тип конфиденциальной информации обнаружен, если в пределах расстояния от 300 символов: регулярное выражение Regex_canada_phin находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1663">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1664">Найдено по крайней мере два ключевых слова из Keyword_canada_phin или Keyword_canada_provinces..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1664">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found..</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1697">Номер социального страхования для Канады</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1697">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1698">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1698">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1699">Девять цифр с необязательными дефисами или пробелами.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1699">Nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1700">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1700">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1701">Форматируемые</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1701">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1702">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1702">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1703">Дефис или пробел</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1703">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1704">Три цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1704">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1705">Дефис или пробел</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1705">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1706">Три цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1706">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1707">Неформатированные: девять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1707">Unformatted: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1708">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1709">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1710">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1711">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1711">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1712">Функция Func_canadian_sin находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1712">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1713">Выполняются по меньшей мере два из таких условий:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1713">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1714">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_sin;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1714">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1715">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_sin_collaborative;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1715">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1716">функция Func_eu_date находит дату в правильном формате.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1716">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1717">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1717">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1718">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1718">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1719">функция Func_unformatted_canadian_sin находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1719">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1720">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_sin;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1720">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1721">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1721">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1746">Номер идентификационной карточки Чили</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1746">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1747">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1747">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1748">7-8 цифр и разделители — контрольная цифра или буква</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1748">7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1749">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1749">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1750">7–8 цифр, а также разделители:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1750">7-8 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1751">1 или 2 цифры;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1751">1-2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1752">точка;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1752">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1753">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1753">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1754">точка;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1754">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1755">Три цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1755">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1756">тире;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1756">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1757">одна цифра или буква (без учета регистра) — проверочная.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1757">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1758">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1759">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1759">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1760">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1761">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1762">функция Func_chile_id_card находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1762">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1763">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_chile_id_card;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1763">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1764">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1764">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-1765">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1766">функция Func_chile_id_card находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1766">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-1767">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1767">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-1769">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-1769">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>
