## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5415">Номер паспорта Луксембург</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5415">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5416">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5416">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5417">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5418">Восемь цифр или букв без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5418">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5419">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5420">Восемь цифр или букв (без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5420">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5421">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5421">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5422">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5422">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5423">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5423">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5424">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5424">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5425">Регулярное выражение `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5425">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5426">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5426">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5427">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5427">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5428">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5428">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5429">номер паспорта латышский паспорт паспорт нет пасснуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5429">passport number latvian passport number passport no passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5430">Идентификационный номер налога на Луксембург</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5430">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5431">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации по идентификационному номеру Европейского налога ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5431">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5432">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5432">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5433">13 цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5433">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5434">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5435">13 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5435">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5436">11 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5436">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5437">две проверочные цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5437">Two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5438">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5438">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5439">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5439">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5440">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5440">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5441">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5441">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5442">Функция `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5442">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5443">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5443">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5444">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5445">Функция `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5445">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5485">Идентификационный номер карты Малайзии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5485">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5486">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5486">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5487">12 цифр, содержащих необязательные дефисы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5487">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5488">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5489">12 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5489">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5490">шесть цифр в формате ГГММДД (дата рождения);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5490">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5491">дефис (необязательно);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5491">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5492">код места рождения из двух букв;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5492">Two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5493">дефис (необязательно);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5493">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5494">три случайные цифры;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5494">Three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5495">код пола из одной цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5495">One-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5496">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5496">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5497">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5497">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5498">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5498">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5499">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5499">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5500">регулярное выражение Regex_malaysia_id_card_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5500">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5501">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5501">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5528">Номер водительского удостоверения для драйвера Мальта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5528">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5529">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера лицензии для драйвера ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5529">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5530">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5531">Сочетание двух символов и шести цифр в указанном шаблоне</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5531">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5532">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5533">Сочетание двух символов и шести цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5533">Combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5534">Два символа (цифры или буквы без учета регистра);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5534">Two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5535">пробел (необязательно); </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5535">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5536">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5536">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5537">пробел (необязательно); </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5537">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5538">Три цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5538">Three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5539">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5540">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5540">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5541">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5542">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5543">Регулярное выражение `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5543">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5544">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5544">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5545">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5545">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5546">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5546">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5547">DL #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5547">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5548">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5548">driver license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5550">Лицензия на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5550">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5551">Drivers лик.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5551">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5552">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5552">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5554">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5554">driver's license</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5560">Национальный идентификационный номер Мальта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5560">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5561">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации ЕС по национальному идентификационному номеру.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5561">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5562">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5562">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5563">Семь цифр, за которыми следует одна буква</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5563">Seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5564">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5564">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5565">Семь цифр, за которыми следует одна буква:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5565">Seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5566">семь цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5566">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5567">Одна прописная буква (с учетом регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5567">One uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5568">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5569">Неприменимо</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5569">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5570">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5571">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5571">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5572">Регулярное выражение `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5572">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5573">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5573">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5574">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 65 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5574">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5575">Регулярное выражение `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5575">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5576">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5576">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5577">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5577">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5579">ID ТАТ — такскса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5579">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5580">идентифика нумру Тал билжетт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5580">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5581">кодиċи нумерали персонали</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5581">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5582">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони персонали</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5582">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5583">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони ТАТ такскса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5583">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5584">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони унику</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5584">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5585">нумру Ta ' идентитà унику</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5585">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5586">нумруные зада сервизз таċ ċиттадин</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5586">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5587">нумру ТАТ — такскса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5587">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5588">персональный числовой код</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5588">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5589">уникальный идентификационный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5589">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5590">уникальный идентификационный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5590">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5591">уникуеидентитино #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5591">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5592">Номер паспорта для Мальта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5592">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5593">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5593">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5594">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5594">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5595">Семь цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5595">Seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5596">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5596">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5597">семь цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5597">Seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5598">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5598">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5599">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5599">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5600">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5600">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5601">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5601">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5602">Регулярное выражение `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5602">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5603">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5603">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5604">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5604">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5605">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5605">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5606">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5606">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5607">номер паспорта Мальтийский</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5607">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5608">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5608">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5609">нумру Тал — пассапорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5609">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5610">Идентификационный номер налога Мальта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5610">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5611">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации по идентификационному номеру Европейского налога ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5611">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5612">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5612">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5613">Для национальных замальтийский: 7 цифр и одна буква в указанном шаблоне</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5613">For Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5614">Мальтийскийные страны и Мальтийский, не являющиеся субъектами: 9 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5614">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5615">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5615">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5616">Мальтийский национальные условия: 7 цифр и одна буква</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5616">Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5617">семь цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5617">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5618">Одна буква (без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5618">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5619">Мальтийскийные страны и Мальтийский, не являющиеся субъектами: 9 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5619">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5620">девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5620">Nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5621">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5622">Неприменимо</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5622">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5623">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5624">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5624">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5625">Функция `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5625">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5626">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5626">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5627">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 65 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5627">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5628">Функция `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5628">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5629">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5629">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5630">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5630">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5631">номер службы для себя</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5631">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5632">ID ТАТ — такскса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5632">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5633">идентифика нумру Тал билжетт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5633">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5634">кодиċи нумерали персонали</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5634">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5635">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони персонали</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5635">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5636">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони ТАТ такскса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5636">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5637">нумру Ta ' идентификаззжони унику</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5637">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5638">нумру Ta ' идентитà унику</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5638">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5661">Номер службы (BSN) для Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5661">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5662">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5662">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5663">8–9 цифр, содержащих необязательные пробелы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5663">8-9 digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5664">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5664">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5665">8–9 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5665">8-9 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5666">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5666">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5667">пробел (необязательно); </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5667">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5668">три цифры; </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5668">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5669">пробел (необязательно); </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5669">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5670">2–3 цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5670">2-3 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5671">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5672">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5672">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5673">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5674">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5674">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5675">функция Func_netherlands_bsn находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5675">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5676">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_netherlands_bsn;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5676">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5677">функция Func_eu_date2 находит дату в правильном формате.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5677">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5678">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5678">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5691">персунсжебонден</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5691">persoonsgebonden</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5692">персунснуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5692">persoonsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5693">соЦиаал — фискаал нуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5693">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5694">социальное — финансовый номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5694">social-fiscal number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5698">униек идентитеитснуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5698">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5699">уникальный идентификационный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5699">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5700">уникальный идентификационный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5700">unique identity number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5702">Номер водительского удостоверения для Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5702">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5703">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера лицензии для драйвера ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5703">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5704">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5705">10 цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5705">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5706">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5707">10 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5707">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5708">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5709">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5709">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5710">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5711">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5712">Регулярное выражение `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5712">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5713">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5713">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5714">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5714">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5715">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5715">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5718">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5718">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5719">Лицензия на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5719">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5724">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5724">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5725">номер лицензии на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5725">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5726">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5726">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5729">рижбевижс</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5729">rijbewijs</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5730">рижбевижснуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5730">rijbewijsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5731">Национальный идентификационный номер Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5731">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5732">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации ЕС по национальному идентификационному номеру.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5732">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5733">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5733">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5734">Девять цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5734">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5735">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5735">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5736">Девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5736">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5737">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5737">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5738">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5738">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5739">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5739">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5740">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5740">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5741">Функция `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5741">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5742">Найдено ключевое слово FROM.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5742">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5743">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5744">Функция `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5744">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5768">Номер паспорта Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5768">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5769">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5769">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5770">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5771">Девять букв или цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5771">Nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5772">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5773">Девять букв или цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5773">Nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5774">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5775">Неприменимо</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5775">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5776">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5777">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5777">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5778">Регулярное выражение `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5778">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5779">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5779">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5780">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5780">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5781">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5781">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5782">номер паспорта для нидерландского языка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5782">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5783">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5783">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5784">номер паспорта Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5784">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5785">недерланден паспурт нуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5785">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5786">паспурт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5786">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5787">недерланден паспуртнуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5787">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5788">паспуртнуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5788">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5789">Идентификационный номер налога Нидерландов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5789">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5790">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации по идентификационному номеру Европейского налога ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5790">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5791">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5792">Девять цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5792">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5793">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5794">Девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5794">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5795">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5795">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5796">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5796">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5797">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5797">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5798">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5798">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5799">Функция `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5799">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5800">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5800">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5801">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5801">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5802">Функция `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5802">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5840">Номер министерства здоровья Новой Зеландии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5840">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5841">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5842">Три буквы, пробел (необязательно) и четыре цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5842">Three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5843">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5844">Три буквы (без учета регистра), пробел (необязательно) из четырех цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5844">Three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5845">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5846">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5846">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5847">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5848">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5848">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5849">функция Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5849">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5850">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_nz_terms;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5850">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5851">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5851">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5852">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5852">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5853">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5853">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5854">нхи</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5854">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5855">Новая Зеландия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5855">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5856">Здравоохранение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5856">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5857">обращения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5857">treatment</span></span> 
   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5858">Идентификационный номер Норвегии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5858">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5859">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5860">11 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5860">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5861">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5862">11 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5862">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5863">шесть цифр в формате ДДММГГ (дата рождения);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5863">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5864">индивидуальный номер из трех цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5864">Three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5865">две проверочные цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5865">Two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5866">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5867">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5868">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5869">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5870">функция Func_norway_id_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5870">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5871">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_norway_id_number;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5871">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5872">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5872">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5873">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5873">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5874">функция Func_norway_id_numbe находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5874">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5875">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5876">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5876">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5877">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5877">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5879">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5879">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5880">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5880">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5881">Процедура</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5881">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5882">персоннуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5882">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5883">фøдселснуммер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5883">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5884">Идентификационный номер единой системы для различных целей Филиппины</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5884">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5885">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5886">12 цифр, разделенных дефисами.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5886">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5887">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5887">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5888">12 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5888">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5889">четыре цифры;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5889">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5890">дефис;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5890">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5891">семь цифр;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5891">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5892">дефис;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5892">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5893">одна цифра.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5893">One digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5894">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5894">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5895">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5895">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5896">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5896">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5897">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5897">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5898">регулярное выражение Regex_philippines_unified_id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5898">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5899">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_philippines_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5899">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5900">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5900">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5901">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5901">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5902">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5902">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5903">умид</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5903">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5904">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5904">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5905">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5905">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5906">Номер водительского удостоверения для драйвера Польша</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5906">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5907">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации номера лицензии для драйвера ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5907">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5908">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5909">14 цифр, содержащих 2 косых черты.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5909">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5910">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5911">14 цифр и 2 косых черт:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5911">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5912">Пять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5912">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5913">косая черта;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5913">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5914">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5914">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5915">косая черта;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5915">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5916">семь цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5916">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5917">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5918">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5918">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5919">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5920">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5920">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5921">Регулярное выражение `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5921">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5922">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5922">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5923">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5923">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5924">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5924">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5925">DL #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5925">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5926">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5926">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5927">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5927">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5928">Лицензия на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5928">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5929">Drivers лик.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5929">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5930">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5930">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5931">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5931">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5932">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5932">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5933">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5933">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5934">номер лицензии на драйвер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5934">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5935">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5935">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5936">длно #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5936">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5937">право жазди</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5937">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5938">Идентификационная карточка Польша</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5938">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5939">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5939">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5940">Три буквы и шесть цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5940">Three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5941">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5941">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5942">Три буквы (без учета регистра), за которыми следуют шесть цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5942">Three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5943">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5943">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5944">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5944">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5945">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5945">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5946">Политика защиты от потери данных — 75% уверенности, что она обнаружила этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в пределах близости от 300 символов: функция Func_polish_national_id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5946">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5947">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5947">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-5948">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-5950">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5950">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5951">Довóд особисти</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5951">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5952">Нумер доводу особистего</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5952">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5953">Назва i нумер доводу особистего</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5953">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5954">Назва i НР доводу особистего</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5954">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-5956">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-5956">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
