- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7110">идентификационный номер налога</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7110">tax identification number</span></span>

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7124">Код SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7124">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7125">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7126">Четыре буквы, за которыми следуют от 5 до 31 буквы или цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7126">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7127">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7127">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7128">Четыре буквы, за которыми следуют от 5 до 31 буквы или цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7128">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7129">Четырехбуквенный код банка (без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7129">Four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7130">Необязательный пробел</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7130">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7131">4–28 букв или цифр (основной номер банковского счета, BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7131">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7132">Необязательный пробел</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7132">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7133">1–3 буквы или цифры (оставшаяся часть BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7133">1-3 letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7134">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7134">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7135">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7135">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7136">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7136">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7137">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7138">регулярное выражение Regex_swift находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7138">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7139">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_swift.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7139">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7173">Национальный идентификационный номер для Тайваня</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7173">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7174">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7175">Одна буква (английская), за которой следуют девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7175">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7176">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7177">Один символ , за которым следуют девять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7177">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7178">Один символ (на английском языке, без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7178">One letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7179">Цифра 1 или 2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7179">The digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7180">Восемь цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7180">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7181">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7182">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7182">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7183">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7184">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7184">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7185">функция Func_taiwanese_national_id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7185">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7186">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_taiwanese_national_id;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7186">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7187">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7187">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7193">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7193">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7194">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7194">身分證字號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7196">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7196">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7197">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7197">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7198">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7198">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7199">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7199">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7200">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7200">簽名</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7202">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7202">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7203">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7203">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7204">Номер паспорта для Тайваня</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7204">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7205">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7205">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7206">Номер биометрического паспорта: девять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7206">Biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7207">Номер биометрической службы Passport: девять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7207">Non-biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7208">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7208">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7209">Номер биометрического паспорта:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7209">Biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7210">цифра "3";</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7210">The digit "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7211">восемь цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7211">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7212">Номер биометрической службы Passport:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7212">Non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7213">девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7213">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7214">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7215">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7215">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7216">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7217">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7218">регулярное выражение Regex_taiwan_passport находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7218">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7219">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_taiwan_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7219">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7230">Номер сертификата резидента (ARC/TARC) для Тайваня</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7230">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7231">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7231">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7232">10 букв и цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7232">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7233">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7233">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7234">10 букв и цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7234">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7235">две буквы (без учета регистра);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7235">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7236">восемь цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7236">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7237">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7238">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7238">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7239">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7240">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7241">регулярное выражение Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7241">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7242">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7242">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7243">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7243">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7256">Код идентификации для тайского заполнения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7256">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7257">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7258">13 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7258">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7259">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7260">13 цифр:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7260">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7261">Первая цифра не равна 0 или 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7261">First digit is not 0 or 9</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7262">12 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7262">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7263">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7263">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7264">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7264">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7265">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7265">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7266">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7266">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7267">Функция Func_Thai_Citizen_Id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7267">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7268">Найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7268">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7269">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7269">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7270">Функция Func_Thai_Citizen_Id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7270">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7273">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7273">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7274">Идентификационный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7274">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7275">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7275">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7276">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7276">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7277">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7277">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7278">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7278">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7279">Турецкий национальный идентификационный номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7279">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7280">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7280">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7281">11 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7281">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7282">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7282">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7283">11 цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7283">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7284">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7284">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7285">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7285">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7286">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7286">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7287">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7287">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7288">Функция Func_Turkish_National_Id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7288">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7289">Найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_Turkish_National_Id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7289">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7290">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7290">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7291">Функция Func_Turkish_National_Id находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7291">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7292">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7292">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7293">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7293">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7294">TC Кимлик No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7294">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7295">TC Кимлик нумарасı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7295">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7296">Ватандаşлıк нумарасı</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7296">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7297">Ватандаşлıк нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7297">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7298">Королевств</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7298">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7299">номер водительского удостоверения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7299">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7300">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации включен в тип конфиденциальной информации номера лицензии для драйвера ЕС и доступен как отдельный объект типа конфиденциальной информации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7300">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7301">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7302">Сочетание 18 букв и цифр в указанном формате.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7302">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7303">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7304">18 букв и цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7304">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7305">Пять букв (без учета регистра) или цифра 9 вместо буквы</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7305">Five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7306">Одна цифра</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7306">One digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7307">Пять цифр в формате даты ММДДИ для даты рождения (седьмой символ увеличивается на 50, если драйвер — гнездо, то есть 51 – 62, а не с 01 – 12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7307">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7308">Две буквы (без учета регистра) или цифра 9 вместо буквы</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7308">Two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7309">Пять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7309">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7310">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7311">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7311">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7312">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7313">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7314">функция Func_uk_drivers_license находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7314">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7315">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_drivers_license;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7315">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7316">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7316">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7322">motor cars</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7322">motor cars</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7323">125cc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7323">125cc</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7324">сидекар</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7324">sidecar</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7325">трициклес</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7325">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7326">моторциклес</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7326">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7327">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7327">photocard licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7330">licence holders</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7330">licence holders</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7331">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7331">driving licences</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7332">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7332">driving licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7333">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7333">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7334">Королевств</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7334">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7335">номер рулона електорал</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7335">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7336">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7336">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7337">Две буквы, за которыми следуют 1–4 цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7337">Two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7338">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7338">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7339">Две буквы (без учета регистра), за которыми следуют 1–4 цифры.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7339">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7340">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7341">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7341">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7342">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7343">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7343">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7344">регулярное выражение Regex_uk_electoral находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7344">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7345">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_electoral.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7345">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7346">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7346">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7347">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7347">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7348">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7348">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7349">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7349">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7350">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7350">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7351">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7351">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7352">Королевств</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7352">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7353">Национальный номер службы работоспособности</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7353">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7354">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7355">10–17 цифр, разделенных пробелами.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7355">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7356">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7357">10-17 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7357">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7358">3 или 10 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7358">Either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7359">Пробел</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7359">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7360">Три цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7360">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7361">Пробел</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7361">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7362">Четыре цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7362">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7363">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7364">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7364">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7365">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7366">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7366">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7367">Функция Func_uk_nhs_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7367">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7368">Верно одно из условий ниже:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7368">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7369">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_nhs_number;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7369">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7370">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_nhs_number1;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7370">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7371">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7371">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7372">Контрольная сумма проходит проверку.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7372">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7373">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7373">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7374">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7374">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7375">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7375">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7376">NHS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7376">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7377">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7377">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7378">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7378">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7379">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7379">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7380">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7380">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7381">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7381">patient identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7382">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7382">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7383">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7383">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7384">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7384">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7385">ГРУПП</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7385">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7386">доб</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7386">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7387">D. O. B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7387">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7388">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7388">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7389">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7389">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7390">Королевств</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7390">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7391">Национальный страховой номер (Нино)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7391">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7392">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации включен в тип конфиденциальной конфиденциальной информации ЕС Идентификаитон и доступен как отдельный объект типа конфиденциальной информации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7392">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7393">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7394">7 символов или 9 символов, разделенных пробелами или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7394">7 characters or 9 characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7395">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7396">Два возможных шаблона:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7396">Two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7397">Две буквы (допустимые Нинос используют только определенные символы в этом префиксе, которые пропускаются при проверке этого шаблона; без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7397">Two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7398">Шесть цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7398">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7399">"A", "B", "C", или "'D" (например, префикс, в суффиксе допускаются только определенные символы; без учета регистра)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7399">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7400">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7400">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7401">Две буквы</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7401">Two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7402">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7402">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7403">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7403">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7404">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7404">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7405">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7405">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7406">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7406">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7407">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7407">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7408">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7408">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7409">Значение "A", "B", "C" или "'D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7409">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7410">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7411">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7411">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7412">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7413">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7414">функция Func_uk_nino находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7414">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7415">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7415">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7416">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7416">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7417">функция Func_uk_nino находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7417">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7418">ни одно ключевое слово из Keyword_uk_nino не находится.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7418">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7420">Keyword_uk_nino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7420">Keyword_uk_nino</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7424">страхования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7424">insurance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7425">social security number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7425">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7426">insurance application
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7426">insurance application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7427">medical application
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7427">medical application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7428">social insurance
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7428">social insurance</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7429">medical attention</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7431">great britain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7431">great britain</span></span>

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7433">Королевств</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7433">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7434">идентификационный номер налога</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7434">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7435">Этот объект типа конфиденциальной информации доступен только в типе конфиденциальной информации по идентификационному номеру Европейского налога ЕС.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7435">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7436">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7437">Уникальная справочная информация о налогоплательщиках (утр): 10 цифр без пробелов и разделителей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7437">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7438">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7439">Уникальная справочная информация о налогоплательщиках (утр): 10 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7439">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7440">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7441">Да</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7441">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7442">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7443">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7443">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7444">Функция `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7444">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7445">Найдено ключевое слово FROM `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7445">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7465">Номер банковского счета США</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7465">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7466">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7466">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7467">8-17 цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7467">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7468">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7468">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7469">8–17 последовательных цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7469">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7470">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7471">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7472">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7473">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7473">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7474">регулярное выражение Regex_usa_bank_account_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7474">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7475">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_usa_Bank_Account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7475">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7505">Номер водительского удостоверения для драйвера США</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7505">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7507">Зависит от штата.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7507">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7508">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7509">В зависимости от штата. Например, для Нью-Йорка:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7509">Depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7510">Девять цифр, отформатированных как DDD DDD DDD, будут совпадают.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7510">Nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7511">Не подойдут девять цифр в формате ццццццццц.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7511">Nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7512">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7513">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7513">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7514">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7515">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7515">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7516">функция Func_new_york_drivers_license_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7516">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7517">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7517">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7518">обнаружено ключевое слово из списка Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7518">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7519">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 65 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7519">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7520">функция Func_new_york_drivers_license_number находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7520">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7521">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7521">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7522">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7522">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7523">ни одно ключевое слово из Keyword_us_drivers_license не находится.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7523">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7621">Индивидуальный идентификационный номер налогоплательщика (SHAREPOINTВ) для США</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7621">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7622">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7623">Девять цифр, которые начинаются с "9" и содержат "7" или "8" в качестве четвертой цифры, отформатированных с помощью пробелов или тире (необязательно).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7623">Nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7624">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7625">Форматируемые</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7625">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7626">Цифра 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7626">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7627">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7627">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7628">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7628">A space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7629">Цифра 7 или 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7629">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7630">Одна цифра</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7630">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7631">Пробел или тире</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7631">A space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7632">Четыре цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7632">Four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7633">Неформатированные</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7633">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7634">Цифра 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7634">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7635">Две цифры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7635">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7636">Цифра 7 или 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7636">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7637">Пять цифр</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7637">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7638">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7638">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7639">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7639">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7640">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7640">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7641">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7641">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7642">Функция Func_formatted_itin находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7642">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7643">Верно по меньшей мере одно из условий ниже:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7643">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7644">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_itin;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7644">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7645">функция Func_us_address находит адрес в правильном формате;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7645">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7646">функция Func_us_date находит дату в правильном формате.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7646">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7647">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_itin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7647">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7648">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7648">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7649">Функция Func_unformatted_itin находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7649">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7650">Верно по меньшей мере одно из условий ниже:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7650">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7651">найдено ключевое слово из Keyword_itin_collaborative;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7651">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7652">функция Func_us_address находит адрес в правильном формате;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7652">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7653">функция Func_us_date находит дату в правильном формате.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7653">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7674">Номер социального страхования (SSN) США</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7674">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7675">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7675">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7676">9 цифр в виде форматированного или неформатированного шаблона.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7676">9 digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7677">Есть SSN выдан до середины 2011 г., он отличается строгим форматированием, при котором определенные части номера должны входить в указанные диапазоны (при этом нет контрольной суммы).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7677">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7678">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7679">Четыре функции выполняют поиск SSN с использованием четырех разных шаблонов:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7679">Four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7680">Func_ssn находит SSN со строгим форматированием с тире или пробелами, выданные до 2011 г. (ццц-цц-цццц ИЛИ ццц цц цццц);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7680">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7681">Func_unformatted_ssn находит SSN со строгим форматированием, выданные до 2011 г. (без форматирования в виде девяти последовательных цифр — ццццццццц);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7681">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7682">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn находит SSN с тире или пробелами, выданные после 2011 г. (ццц-цц-цццц ИЛИ ццц цц цццц);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7682">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7683">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn находит SSN без форматирования в виде девяти последовательных цифр, выданные после 2011 г. (ццццццццц).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7683">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7684">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7684">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7685">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7685">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7686">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7686">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7687">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 85 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7687">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7688">Функция Func_ssn находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7688">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7689">Находится ключевое слово из Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7689">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7690">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7690">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7691">Функция Func_unformatted_ssn находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7691">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7692">Находится ключевое слово из Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7692">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7693">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 65 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, отдаленном не более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7693">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7694">Функция Func_randomized_formatted_ssn находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7694">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7695">Находится ключевое слово из Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7695">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7696">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 55 % верно обнаружила этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в пределах ближайших 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7696">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7697">Функция Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7697">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7698">Находится ключевое слово из Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7698">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7709">США/ВЕЛИКОБРИТАНИЯ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7709">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7710">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7710">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7711">Великобритания</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7711">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7712">Объект типа конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта доступен в типе конфиденциальной информации номера паспорта ЕС и доступен как отдельный объект типа конфиденциальной информации.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7712">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7713">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7713">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7714">Девять цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7714">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7715">Шаблон</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7715">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7716">Девять последовательных цифр.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7716">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7717">Контрольная сумма</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7717">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7718">Нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7718">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d178e-7719">Определение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7719">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d178e-7720">Политика защиты от потери данных с вероятностью в 75 % верно обнаруживает этот тип конфиденциальной информации, если в расположении, не отдаленном более чем на 300 знаков:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7720">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7721">функция Func_usa_uk_passport находит содержимое, которое соответствует шаблону;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7721">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d178e-7722">находится ключевое слово из Keyword_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d178e-7722">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
